DOC.brief_summary: The investigators objective is to assess quality of life and functional outcome in patients requiring short-term mechanical ventilation. Additionally, the investigators plan to measure the recovery of peripheral muscle strength and respiratory muscle strength during recovery.
DOC.brief_title: Weaning From Mechanical Ventilation in the ICU
DOC.criteria: ICU patients who require mechanical ventilation for at least 2 days the ability to speak English willing to participate patients who require mechanical ventilation at home before hospitalization patients previously requiring mechanical ventilation at an LTAC facility
